Translations.Text: M
Ta tse vysvitlyuyuche svyate pysannya
My poslaly tse vnyz u blahoslovenniy nochi, dlya my musymo poperedyty
U tse (svyate pysannya), kozhna materiya wisdom roz'yasnyayetʹsya
Tse ye predetermined komanda z nas shcho my posylayemo kur'yeram
Tse ye myloserdya z vashoho Lorda. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Omniscient
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy. Yakby tilʹky vy mohly buty pevni
Nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Vin kontrolyuye zhyttya ta smertʹ; vash Lord ta Lord vashykh predkiv
Diysno, vony ye doubtful, neuvazhnyy
Tomu, hodynnyk dlya dnya koly nebo prynosytʹ hlybokyy dym
Tse bude konvert lyudy; tse ye bolisnyy retribution
Nash Lord, relieve tse retribution dlya nas; my viruyuchi
Zaraz shcho tse zapiznyuyetʹsya nadto, vony zapam'yatayutʹ! Vysvitlyuyuchyy kur'yer prybuv yim
Ale vony prohnaly z yoho, kazhuchy, "Dobre osvichenoho, ale bozhevilʹnoho
My budemo relieve retribution dlya deyakoho chasu; vy skoro pereydete
denʹ my vrazhayemo velykyy udar, my budemo avenge
My vyprobuvaly pered tym, yak yim lyudy Pharaoh; pochesnyy kur'yer poyikhav yim
Proholoshuyutʹ: "Poslukhayte meni, sluzhbovtsi BOHA. YA ye chesnyy kur'yer do vas
Ta, "Ne porushuyutʹ proty BOHA. YA prynoshu do vas potuzhni dokazy
ya shukayu prytulku u moyomu Lordi ta vashomu Lordi, yakshcho vy protystavlyayete meni
Yakshcho vy ne bazhayete poviryty, todi prosto vid'yidzhayete meni yedyni
Z·hodom, vin blahav yoho Lorda: "Tse - bezputni lyudy
(Boh skazav,) "Peresuvannya z Moyimy sluzhbovtsyamy pid chas nochi; vy budete peresliduvatysya
Peresikayutʹ more shvydko; yikhniy viysʹko bude tonutysya
Otzhe, vony obihnaly bahato parku ta pruzhyn
Zerno ta rozkishne zhyttya
Blahoslovennya shcho vony otrymaly nasolodu
Vsi tsi my vyklykaly buty uspadkovani inshymy lyudʹmy
Ni nebesa, ni zemlya plakala nad nymy, ta vony ne respited
